# INBOX compliance checklist
- [ ] All changes are under INBOX/<YYYYMMDD>/<Txx>/
- [ ] Filenames match the required pattern
- [ ] Markdown front-matter is present with required keys

# No invention rules
- [ ] CLAIM / EVIDENCE / ASSUMPTION / RISK blocks are included where applicable
- [ ] No numeric performance claims without evidence path in 05_DATA and a UID entry

# Security and export self-check
- [ ] No secrets, keys, or credentials
- [ ] Content is not ITAR/EAR controlled by default; escalate if uncertain
